ingredients.ingredient: 6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded flat
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Pound chicken breasts to uniform thickness for even cooking
Spread pesto evenly on flattened chicken before wrapping with bacon
Sear in hot oil for 3-4 minutes per side until bacon is crispy and chicken reaches 165°F internal temperature
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Emphasize the importance of pounding chicken flat and help them understand when to finish cooking in the oven if needed.
